actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to declare certain portions of Pelican Island, Texas, nonnavigable.

summary.text: Declares certain portions of Pelican Island, Texas, to be nonnavigable waters. Applies such declaration to areas which are or will be bulkheaded and filled or otherwise occupied by permanent structures, including marina facilities.

titles.title: A bill to declare certain portions of Pelican Island, Texas, nonnavigable.
